text:
A communication error has occurred.
Your communications environment could be
unstable. If you continue to see this error,
please visit the Nintendo Support website.

Communication with the locale you were
visiting has been interrupted.

You can't join at this time because the
destination locale is full.

Game play has stopped because an error
occurred. Please return to the HOME Menu
and close the game.

This session is ending since there aren't
enough controllers connected for everyone.

*The game will return to the state it was in at
the last auto-save.
